match.data: Word: _am_ a_wa_s _ai_ l_fe wa_ l_ke a _ox of ch_co_at_s.\n

write.data: Mama always said life was like a box of chocolates.\x0a

match.data: Next Word: _r_e_, f_r l_c_ _f a b_t_e_ _o_d, _s g_o_.\n

write.data: Greed, for lack of a better word, is good.\n
Nobody puts Baby in a corner.\n
May the Force be with you.\n

match.data: Next Word: _pen the pod bay doo_s p_eas_, H_L.\n

write.data: Open the pod bay doors please, HAL.\n

match.data: Next Word: _f y_u b_i_d i_, h_ _i_l c_m_.\n

write.data: If you build it, he will come.\n

match.data: Next Word: _ lo_e t_e s_ell of _apa_m i_ th_ mo_nin_.\n

write.data: I love the smell of napalm in the morning.\n

match.data: Next Word: _'m _s m_d a_ he_l, _nd _'m _ot _oin_ to tak_ th_s a_ymo_e!\n

write.data: I'm as mad as hell, and I'm not going to take this anymore!\n

match.data: Final Round. Chose another 2 digit number\n
_ha_ w_'v_ g_t _er_ i_ f_il_re to co_mu_ic_te.\n

write.data: What we've got here is failure to communicate.\n
